alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 3:58PM CDT until May 17 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DALE AND NORTHWESTERN HENRY COUNTIES... At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blue Springs, or 8 miles southeast of Clio, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Bells Crossroads, Skipperville, Edwin, Scottsboro Crossroads, Roberts Crossroads, Snells Crossroads, Barefield Crossroads, Graball, Clopton, Phillips Crossroads, Bertha and Lawrenceville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
